participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and friendly, enjoys engaging in conversations to learn more about others.
participant_1.background: A recent graduate working in marketing, Alex enjoys exploring new ideas and networking.

content.text: Nice to see you too. What is your profession?
